contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=March 2010}} {{Infobox musical artist |image = |image_size =200 |name =Mercedes Sherida Lander |background = solo_singer |caption = |birth_name =Mercedes Sherida Lander |birth_date ={{birth date and age|1984|1|25}} |origin =[[London, Ontario]] |Death = |genre =[[Metalcore]] |occupation =[[Musician]] |Years_active =1996-present (with Kittie) |instrument =[[Drum kit|Drums]], [[piano]], [[Singing|vocals]], [[trombone]] |First_album = |Last_album = |Notable_albums = |Notable_songs = |label = |associated_acts =[[Kittie]] |website ={{URL|http://www.kittierocks.com}} }} '''Mercedes Sherida Lander''' (born January 25, 1984) is the [[drummer]] and [[backing vocalist]] for the [[Canada|Canadian]] [[alternative metal]] group [[Kittie]]. Her sister, [[Morgan Lander]], also sings and plays guitar for Kittie. Other than Morgan she is the only other original member of Kittie.<ref>{{cite web|url={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p380977/biography|pure_url=yes}}|title=Biography: Kittie|last=Blanford|first=Roxanne |publisher=[[Allmusic]]|accessdate=5 March 2010}}</ref> She was also the leading vocals for a small Canadian project band called Night of the Demons. They were considered hardcore and focused on horror themed lyrics. They have only released one [[extended play|E.P.]] to date. In 2011 Mercedes joined the all girl power pop band [[The Alcohollys]] which also includes the likes of [[Tanya Candler]], the original [[Kittie]] bass player. They are slated to put out an EP in early 2013.
